How do I create a trip?

To create a trip, simply fill in the required information in the create tab. To select a time or date, simply tap on the text. If you made a mistake, you can delete your trip assuming no passengers have joined.
How do I know if someone has joined my trip?

There are two ways to know if somebody has joined your trip. First, navigate to the specific trip. Once you are there, you can either look at the seats available or click view passengers for a more in-depth list of your passengers as well as how to contact them.
Can I modify a trips details?

Yes! To do this, you just need to open the specific trip and tap on the item you want to modify. Please note however that once a passenger joins, you cannot modify trip details. If there is an error, you should contact your passengers or delete the trip.
You cannot see a rating a passenger has given you for a specific trip, however, your overall rating is listed on the account tab.
What is the difference between closing and deleting a trip?

When a trip has not yet occurred (at most one day before the trip), a specific trip will display a delete trip button which allows you to permanently delete a trip. Close trip arrives on the day of the trip and onwards and is used to indicate that a trip is complete. Please note that once you have reached the day of the trip, you cannot cancel it.
